Broken Blonde Media

Chaos Rising

Cinematography   

I worked as one of several directors of photography on Chaos Rising, an ambitious medieval fantasy web series currently in post-production (release planned for Spring 2022).

After a highly successful Kickstarter campaign, the episode was shot in Autumn 2021 with an incredible cast and crew, most notably the world-renowned and highly experienced stunt performers of Combat International.
